name: Offbeat Soccer
description:
Game Concept:
We created a fun football game where the player has to shoot a goal using weapons rather than kicking it with his/her feet. This game is a combination of shooter + sports genre. Play against AI and try to score more goals than the AI.

Game Mechanics:
Use WASD to move the character in all directions.
Press shift to run.
Use “Q” & “E” to place Mine & throw Grenade

Use weapons to shoot the ball in the opponent’s goal post and use mines and grenades to deviate the path of the ball.

NOTE: The disclaimer is present in the build.
